blogPost.excerpt: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated
blogPost.body: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated
blogPost.title: Jooseph - Content curation tool for paid learning paths
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Jooseph是一个内容策划工具，供课程创建者与受众分享学习路径。- 从网络上的任何链接创建交互式学习路径--接受付费订阅，并赚钱--发布公告，让你的受众得到更新。
localize.tagline: 付费学习路径的内容策划工具

localize.description: Jooseph是一個內容策劃工具，供課程創建者與受衆分享學習路徑。- 從網絡上的任何鏈接創建交互式學習路徑--接受付費訂閱，並賺錢--發佈公告，讓你的受衆得到更新。
localize.tagline: 付費學習路徑的內容策劃工具

previous.excerpt: Chums is a community to recommend products to friends. 1. Make a profile with your favorite products 2. Ask your friends and interest groups for help 3. Make group chats just for shopping
previous.title: Chums - Help friends buy stuff online

localize.description: Chums是一个向朋友推荐产品的社区。1. 用你喜欢的产品建立一个档案 2. 向你的朋友和兴趣小组寻求帮助 3. 建立群聊，只为购物
localize.tagline: 帮助朋友在网上买东西

localize.description: Chums是一個向朋友推薦產品的社區。1. 用你喜歡的產品建立一個檔案 2. 向你的朋友和興趣小組尋求幫助 3. 建立羣聊，只爲購物
localize.tagline: 幫助朋友在網上買東西

next.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your team’s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
next.title: Clara - Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm

localize.description: 拉美地区公司的端到端支出管理。发放无限的实体卡或虚拟卡，为每张卡设置限额，实时了解您团队的支出情况，并在发票匹配等繁琐任务上节省宝贵的时间。
localize.tagline: 为拉美地区的公司提供清晰、简化的支出管理。

localize.description: 拉美地區公司的端到端支出管理。發放無限的實體卡或虛擬卡，爲每張卡設置限額，實時瞭解您團隊的支出情況，並在發票匹配等繁瑣任務上節省寶貴的時間。
localize.tagline: 爲拉美地區的公司提供清晰、簡化的支出管理。
